## Summary

The National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT), Bengaluru Bench has approved the Composite Scheme of Arrangement for the amalgamation of Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited (Scrip Code: 530011) into Paradeep Phosphates Limited. The record date for determining shareholder entitlements has been set as October 31, 2025. Trading in Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited shares will be suspended from October 31, 2025 (Settlement No. DR-747/2025-2026).

## Key Points

- NCLT Bengaluru Bench has approved the merger of Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited (Transferor Company) into Paradeep Phosphates Limited (Transferee Company)
- Share exchange ratio: 187 fully paid-up equity shares of Rs.10/- each of Paradeep Phosphates Limited for every 100 fully paid-up equity shares of Rs.10/- each of Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited
- Record date fixed: October 31, 2025
- Trading suspension effective from October 31, 2025
- Settlement Number: DR-747/2025-2026
- Equity shares of Paradeep Phosphates Limited (Resulting Company) will be listed on BSE Limited subject to compliance with requisite formalities

## Regulatory Changes

No new regulatory changes introduced. This circular implements existing NCLT-approved scheme of amalgamation under applicable company law provisions.

## Compliance Requirements

- Trading members must note the suspension of trading in Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited shares effective October 31, 2025
- No dealings permitted in the scrip from the record date
- Shareholders of Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited will automatically receive shares of Paradeep Phosphates Limited as per the approved scheme
- All requisite formalities must be completed for listing of Paradeep Phosphates Limited shares on BSE

## Important Dates

- **October 27, 2025**: Circular notice date
- **October 31, 2025**: Record date for determining shareholder entitlements
- **October 31, 2025**: Trading suspension effective date (Settlement No. DR-747/2025-2026)

## Impact Assessment

**Market Impact**: High - Complete cessation of trading in Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited shares with mandatory share exchange for all shareholders.

**Shareholder Impact**: Shareholders will receive 1.87 shares of Paradeep Phosphates Limited for each share held in Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited, representing a significant dilution factor but consolidating operations under the transferee company.

**Operational Impact**: The amalgamation consolidates the fertilizer business operations under Paradeep Phosphates Limited, potentially creating operational synergies and a stronger combined entity in the chemicals and fertilizers sector.

**Listing Impact**: Mangalore Chemicals & Fertilisers Limited will be delisted post-amalgamation, while Paradeep Phosphates Limited shares will continue trading on BSE with expanded capital base.
